page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ALISON
page.content: During a school week I wake up between 7.00 and 7.30 a.m. My brother, my{mum}and me all set off walking to school at about 8.25 a.m. We start{school}at 8.50 a.m.and have our first break at 10.30. We then go back into our{lessons}at 10.45. We carry on working until midday. At midday we have our dinner. School starts at 1.15 p.m. At 2.20 we have another break, this lasts 10 minutes. We then work through until 3.30. Then we go home. When I get home I either play out and then have my tea, or have my tea and then{play}out. Sometimes at night I go out with my{friends.} On a Monday night we go to a{youth}group and we sometimes go{rollerskating.} Most nights I go to bed at 9.30 p.m., but it depends on what I'm doing.
